subProduct.des: The new BOSS Bottled Marine brings an exhilarating burst of freshness to the iconic BOSS scent.
des_content: Experience ice-cool summer freshness as frozen apple sizzles into the warm and textured woods.
Explore the full BOSS Bottled range to find your perfect fragrance for under the sun.
des_about_des: PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

BOSS Bottled Marine Eau de Toilette brings an exhilarating burst of freshness to the iconic BOSS scent. Frozen apple combines with warm woody notes to evoke the atmosphere of a summer day by the water.

The invigorating scent is defined by bursts of frozen apple and energising spearmint before moving into notes of cinnamon and clary sage. Patchouli and notes of cashmere wood combine in a most sophisticated contrast to marine freshness.

BOSS Bottled Marine is presented in the signature BOSS Bottled glass bottle with a frosted blue finish that reflects the cool freshness of the fragrance. The brushed cap comes in deep, masculine blue for timeless, marine-inspired elegance.

Alcohol Denat., Aqua/water/eau, Parfum/fragrance, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Butyl, Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Linalool, Limonene, Coumarin, Geraniol, Citral, Citronellol, Eugenol, Cinnamal, Citric Acid, Isoeugenol, Ext. Violet 2 (Ci 60730), Blue 1 (Ci 42090)

subProduct.des:
The iconic BOSS Bottled fragrance family celebrates the many facets of modern masculinity, reminding us that every man can be a Man of Today in his own way. Sharing a vibrant and masculine signature, each BOSS Bottled fragrance inspires men around the world to follow their own path forward while staying true to their core values of honesty, integrity, and authenticity.

Starring BOSS Bottled global fragrance ambassador and actor Chris Hemsworth, the Man of Today campaign celebrates the journey towards success and self-fulfillment, a journey where a man's inner life has the same importance as the face he shows to the world.
des_content: Warm, vibrant and unforgettable, BOSS Bottled Eau de Toilette is as versatile and rich in contrasts as the man who wears it. The masculine accords of this timeless composition unfold hour by hour on the skin, inspiring its wearer to make the most of each day. As relevant now as the day it was launched more than 20 years ago, BOSS Bottled Eau de Toilette has become an essential part of the daily routines of men around the world.

The world of BOSS Bottled is brought to life by Australian actor Chris Hemsworth, a man who embodies the multi-faceted vision of a Man of Today. His drive to make the most of every moment and follow his own path forward make him the perfect choice for a campaign that celebrates the diversity of modern masculinity.
des_about_des: PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

The BOSS man is primed to succeed – competitive, driven and ambitious. His daily preparation rituals are integral to his personal quest for success and BOSS Bottled has become an established part of his daily armour. Confident and contemporary: clean lines make BOSS Bottled an iconic classic and the encapsulation of BOSS in a fragrance.

subProduct.des: Celebrate in gold with the limited-edition BOSS BOTTLED Eau de Parfum, presented in a golden mirror-finish bottle. A fragrance combining the freshness of apple and bergamot notes with intensely addictive cardamom, and the dark elegance of vetiver.
des_content: BOSS Bottled Eau de Parfum brings together exclusively sourced natural ingredients and innovative new extraction methods to create a luxurious spicy-woody scent with a luxurious singularity, and surprising contemporary facets.
An intense and refined masculinity. Created for every driven, ambitious man who is following his own path forward, determined to be a Man of Today in his own way.
des_about_des: PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

Celebrate in gold with the limited edition BOSS Bottled Eau de Parfum. Created for driven, ambitious men ready to take on every challenge that comes their way, this noble composition brings a new intensity to the warmth and vibrancy of the timeless BOSS Bottled signature.

Senses are awakened with a burst of apple and bergamot contrasted with essence of black pepper. The spicy heart unfolds with warm and addictive cardamom and cinnamon oils. Exuding a powerful balance of strength and sophistication, base notes of dark vetiver and musk evolve through time, delivering a leathery and smoky signature.

Composed by master perfumer Honorine Blanc, BOSS Bottled Eau de Parfum brings together exclusively sourced natural ingredients and innovative new extraction methods to create a scent with a luxurious singularity and surprising contemporary facets.
The iconic bottle is presented in a golden mirror-finish for the holiday season and complete with a timelessly elegant brushed golden cap.

subProduct.des:
The iconic BOSS Bottled fragrance family celebrates the many facets of modern masculinity, reminding us that every man can be a Man of Today in his own way. Sharing a vibrant and masculine signature, each BOSS Bottled fragrance inspires men around the world to follow their own path forward while staying true to their core values of honesty, integrity, and authenticity.

Starring BOSS Bottled global fragrance ambassador and actor Chris Hemsworth, the Man of Today campaign celebrates the journey towards success and self-fulfillment, a journey where a man's inner life has the same importance as the face he shows to the world.
des_content: BOSS Bottled Eau de Parfum brings together exclusively sourced natural ingredients and innovative new extraction methods to create a luxurious spicy-woody scent with a luxurious singularity, and surprising contemporary facets.

An intense and refined masculinity. Created for every driven, ambitious man who is following his own path forward, determined to be a Man of Today in his own way.

The Eau de Parfum brings a new intensity to the warmth and vibrancy of the timeless BOSS Bottled signature that has been a favourite with men for more than 20 years.
des_about_des: PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

subProduct.des:
Like your sharpest suit, BOSS Bottled Tonic Eau de Toilette is sleek and sophisticated. Strive for success with this men's aftershave.

Embodying modern masculinity in a unique, vibrant scent, BOSS Bottled Tonic empowers the wearer to refocus and achieve his goals. The fragrance is incredibly fresh, giving the BOSS man a burst of energy with every spray.
des_about_des: PRODUCT DESCRIPTION

subProduct.des: Feel the power of attraction pull you in with BOSS The Scent Le Parfum. The iconic ambery signature of BOSS The Scent for an alchemy impossible to resist. Available in For Him and For Her versions.
des_content:
Feel the power of attraction pull you in with BOSS The Scent Le Parfum. Experience smoky notes of leather of for him and vibrant orange blossom of for her. These two powerfully seductive new fragrances are undeniably irresistible.

Worn by actors Jacob Elordi and Laura Harrier.
des_about_des: PRODUCT DESCRIPTION
Feel the power of attraction pull you in with BOSS The Scent Le Parfum for him.

This intense reinterpretation of the iconic ambery signature of BOSS The Scent, Le Parfum ignites the senses with an addictive iris and leather accord, unleashing an alchemy of attraction impossible to resist.

Aphrodisiac top notes of ginger and exotic Maninka fruit offer the magnetic pull of the BOSS The Scent signature, while a contrasting heart of precious iris sets a passionate stage. A deeply masculine leather base adds warmth to this inviting fragrance.

The iconic bottle is lacquered in a sensual shade of taupe and set within a rose gold cage. Presented in a taupe box, BOSS The Scent Le Parfum for men is a powerful fragrance that takes seduction into a whole new dimension.
Spray BOSS The Scent Le Parfum for Him on pulse points around the body - neck, wrists, ankles - to increase the longevity of the fragrance.

Alcohol Denat., Parfum/fragrance, Aqua/water/eau · Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Linalool, Limonene, Alpha-isomethyl Ionone, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Hydroxycitronellal, Citronellol, Coumarin, Citral, Geraniol, Alcohol, Tris (Tetramethylhydroxypiperidinol) Citrate, Cinnamal, Eugenol, Isoeugenol, Bht, Disodium Edta, Green 5 (Ci 61570), Red 33 (Ci 17200), Yellow 5 (Ci 19140)
